MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of Rainford, affecting properties in St Helens Road, Mill Lane and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:09PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 3:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:02PM on 25th December 2020
